sec.div: 2.1. Chemical Composition of Syzygium aromaticum Essential Oil and Argan Oil
sec.p: Syzygium aromaticum essential oil was obtained with a percentage of 12.6% ( w/ w). The chemical composition of Syzygium aromaticum essential oil obtained with Gas chromatography–mass spectrometry (GC/MS) was represented in ( Table 1). The result showed that Eugenol (2-Methoxy-4-(2-propenyl) phenol) is the major constituent of the oil with a percentage of 87.03% followed by Eugenyl acetate (4-Allyl-2-methoxyphenyl acetate) with a percentage of 11.25%. The composition of Argan oil includes Schottenol (159 mg/100 g), Spinasterol (129 mg/100 g), Stigmasta-8,22-dien-3β-ol (12 mg/100 g) and other (27 mg/100 g).

sec.div: 2.2. Antioxidant Content and Activity of Syzygium aromaticum Essential Oil and Argan Oil
sec.p: The results showed that the content of antioxidant compounds in Syzygium aromaticum essential oil is higher than that found in Argan oil ( Table 2). The Total antioxidant capacity (TAC) of the Syzygium aromaticum essential oil is higher than Argan oil.

sec.div: 2.3. Effect of the Interventions on Enzymatic Markers
sec.p: The result ( Figure 1) showed that Argan oil and clove essential oil prepared in Argan oil alleviated the effect of H 2O 2 on Lactate dehydrogenase (LDH), Alanine aminotransferase (ALT) and aspartate aminotransferase (AST). H 2O 2 increased level of liver enzymes.

sec.div: 2.4. Effect of the Interventions on Total Protein and Albumin Levels
sec.p: The result showed that H 2O 2 significantly decreases the total protein and albumin ( Figure 2). However, when H 2O 2 was used with Argan oil or with Argan oil and clove essential oil, there was no significant change in the total protein or albumin as compared to the water group except for total protein in group that received H 2O 2 with Argan oil.

sec.div: 2.5. Effect of the Interventions on TC, TG, LDL-C, HDL-C and VLDL Levels
sec.p: H 2O 2 increases the total cholesterol, LDL-C, TG and VLDL and decreases HDL-C, whereas in groups that received Argan oil or Argan oil with essential oil of Syzygium aromaticum, there was no significant change in these parameters ( Figure 3).

sec.div: 2.6. Effect of the Interventions on Serum Electrolytes
sec.p: H 2O 2 alone or with use of argan oil or Syzygium aromaticum essential oil with Argan oil did not cause significant changes in the blood electrolytes ( Table 3).

sec.div: 2.7. Effect of the Interventions on Blood Urea and Creatinine Levels
sec.p: H 2O 2 did not cause a significant change in the plasma creatinine as compared to the control. Blood urea is significantly increased in the group received H 2O 2, while in groups received H 2O 2 with Argan oil or Argan oil with Syzygium aromaticum essential oil, there was no change in the blood urea level ( Table 4).

sec.div: 2.8. Effect of the Interventions on Organs Weights
sec.p: Liver and kidney weights and relative weights were significantly increased in the H 2O 2 treated group, while brain weight and relative brain weight were significantly decreased ( Table 5). The same results were encountered in the group received H 2O 2 with Argan oil. However, in the group received H 2O 2 with Argan oil with Syzygium aromaticum essential oil, there was no changes in the kidney weight and relative kidney weight.

sec.div: 2.9. Effects of the Interventions on Histopathological Changes

sec.p: Histopathological examination of the brain tissue ( Figure 4) showed that H 2O 2 induces congestion and hemorrhage. However, it did not induce brain hemorrhage when used along with the Argan oil or Syzygium aromaticum essential oil emulsified in Argan oil.

Histopathological examination of the liver tissue ( Figure 5) demonstrated that H 2O 2 induces dilatation in the central vein, inflammation and binucleation. However, it induced only dilatation in the central vein when it was co-administered with Argan oil or Syzygium aromaticum essential oil emulsified in Argan oil.

Histopathological examination of the kidney tissue ( Figure 6) showed that H 2O 2 induces kidney tissue congestion, however, when it was co-administered with Syzygium aromaticum essential oil emulsified in Argan oil, H 2O 2 did not cause histopathological change in the kidney tissue.
